title: Neural Network Models Towards Space Group Determination Using Dynamically Simulated EBSD and TKD Patterns
content: Accurate determination of crystallographic space groups is a cornerstone in materials science, enabling the elucidation of material properties and guiding the design of novel materials. This study introduces a novel approach that leverages neural network models and high-throughput simulation to predict space groups from Electron Backscattered Diffraction (EBSD) or Transmission Kikuchi Diffraction (TKD) patterns. By employing advanced machine learning techniques and simulated datasets, this method may help overcome traditional limitations by offering a robust, high-throughput tool for automated crystallographic analysis without the prerequisite of prior material phase knowledge.
